p:
The Cisco Software
		  License Activation feature includes Cisco IOS XR EXEC commands that allow the
		  executing of basic licensing tasks from the CLI.

To install a
		  license using Cisco IOS XR commands, perform these tasks:

info.p:
(In
				admin-config mode) Ensures that the license for a particular feature ID is
				available at all locations of the Cisco ASR 9001-S Router.

content:
How to verify the configured license in the configuration:

RP/0/RSP0/CPU0:ASR9001-S#

Mon Dec 23 23:25:22.532 UTC
license A9K-9001-120G-LIC
location all
!

info.p:
Installs the
				upgrade license at the Cisco ASR 9001-S Router.

step.cmd:
Reload or
			 TURBOBOOT the Cisco ASR 9001-S Router.

info.p:
Reload the
				Cisco ASR-9001-S Router or TURBOBOOT it, this is necessary since the License
				checks happen during the boot procedures, so either TURBOBOOT or RELOAD is
				mandatory to enable license updates.
